mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BNO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_AREA) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_BNO.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{boardArea})
mapper.select: SELECT FREE_BNO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, M.PROFILE_IMAGE, BOARD_AREA, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM FREE_BOARD F LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON F.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND FREE_BNO = #{fno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, MEMBER_NO, FREE_BNO, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_REP_NO.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{freeBno}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, FREE_BNO, NICKNAME, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND FREE_BNO = ${freeBno}
